Application.Name: MPDJB
Application.Author: joblo10
Application.Description: Music Player Daemon Music Jukebox. MPDJB is a PHP interface used to browse a MPD music database and to control music playback. It allows to browse your library by folders, artists, albums or genres and to list user-defined playlists.
Application.UsageInstructions: 1 - Install MPD ( http://www.networkedmediatank.com/showth...?tid=17306 ). 2 - Make sure you have the MyIhome service started on your NMT.
